html:
Say tri seas
What is it
Eastern block
Reaching three seas

Shared market
Shared borders
Built with thought for
Our citizens

Proclaiming neutrality
Peace on all axis
Get a pack of
Bulgarian smokes

Local chicken
Because I want
Drving Polonez
On all the roads

We work for
Our people
When we know
We teach

Independent
From the threats
Armed to teeth
In a case

Our industry
Is so potent
We’re a major
World exporter

We support
The world peace
We won’t let
Larger conflicts
title: Seas
